mapper.insert: INSERT INTO order_list (order_no, user_no, order_use_coupon, order_dlv_fee, order_total_price, order_delivery_info, order_status, order_date, order_update_date) VALUES (order_list_seq.NEXTVAL, #{user_no}, #{order_use_coupon}, 3000, #{order_total_price}, #{order_delivery_info}, '결제 완료', SYSDATE, SYSDATE)
mapper.select: SELECT po.product_no as product_no, ol.order_use_coupon as order_use_coupon, ol.order_dlv_fee as order_dlv_fee, ol.order_total_price as order_total_price, ol.order_delivery_info as order_delivery_info, ol.order_date as order_date, po.quantity as quantity FROM order_list ol INNER JOIN product_order po ON ol.order_no = po.order_no WHERE ol.user_no = #{user_no} ORDER BY ol.order_date DESC FETCH FIRST 1 ROWS ONLY

SELECT distinct(po.order_no), ol.order_total_price, ol.order_date, ol.order_status FROM order_list ol INNER JOIN product_order po ON ol.order_no = po.order_no WHERE ol.user_no = #{user_no} order by order_date desc

SELECT po.order_detail_no, po.product_no, po.quantity, ol.order_no, ol.order_use_coupon, ol.order_dlv_fee, ol.order_total_price, ol.order_delivery_info, ol.order_status, ol.order_date, p.product_name, p.product_main_image FROM order_list ol INNER JOIN product_order po ON ol.order_no = po.order_no inner join product p on p.product_no = po.product_no WHERE ol.order_no = #{order_no}
